items.sentence: I learned today that Tom doesn\'t like me. Do you know why?
I never thought it\'d be this hard to build a picnic table.
I really didn\'t want to play tag with Tom and his friends.
I don\'t think that anyone else noticed what Tom was doing.
I left home early because I didn\'t want to miss the train.
When I was a child, I used to go to the beach every summer.
How many spoonfuls of sugar do you usually put in your tea?
I forbid you to speak with anyone about what just happened.
Tom had to swallow his pride and admit that he needed help.
Tom is the only one who knows the combination for the safe.
Tom locked himself in the bathroom and refused to come out.
Tom didn\'t tell me what the meeting was going to be about.
Tom doesn\'t come here every day, but he comes quite often.
Tom doesn\'t have enough money yet to buy the car he wants.
Can you recommend a good over-the-counter allergy medicine?
Tom is looking for someone to teach French to his children.
Tom is much shorter and weighs considerably less than Mary.
Tom was the only one studying when I entered the classroom.
Tom was well liked by his classmates, teachers and friends.
What kind of things can people do to help reduce pollution?
Tom hates parents who don\'t control their bratty children.
I thought it would be difficult for her to get the tickets.
Tom leaned in and gave Mary a passionate kiss on the mouth.
Tom lives with his parents in a small house on Park Street.
Tom was willing to wait, but I told him he didn\'t have to.
Tom\'s house looked like it hadn\'t been cleaned for years.
I owe Mary some money and must pay her back by next Monday.
I think I now have enough money to buy the car that I want.
Tom wasn\'t able to stay in Boston as long as he wanted to.
Tom brought way too much food, so there was some left over.
Tom did a pretty good job of selecting music for the dance.
You said Tom was upset, but he didn\'t seem that way to me.
How young were you when you first started singing on stage?
I asked twenty people to my party but not all of them came.
I assumed you might be hungry so I brought some sandwiches.
I\'ve only been here for a day and I already want to leave.
If you want to do that, I\'m not going to try and stop you.
Tom decided not to buy the car he was looking at yesterday.
Tom wants to know if you\'re planning to come to his party.
Sometimes we do what we have to do, not what we want to do.
The last thing we want to do is to forget to pay our bills.
Let me explain it once more, so you understand what I mean.
Tom thought that the amulet would protect him from witches.
I\'m sick of listening to the same kind of music every day.
I\'m wondering if this is a good time to buy the new model.
If I ever see you doing that again, I\'ll tell your father.
Tom was greatly affected by the death of his only daughter.
Some of Tom\'s ideas were good, but a lot of them weren\'t.
I think that I now have enough money to buy the car I want.
Tom didn\'t have enough money to buy what he wanted to buy.
Tom ripped his new socks getting them out of the packaging.
Tom said he saw a shark the other day when he was swimming.
Tom is no longer covered by his parents\' health insurance.
I usually don\'t continue reading books that I don\'t like.
I wish that Tom hadn\'t told Mary that I\'d been in prison.
I felt quite relieved after I had said all I wanted to say.
One hour of sleep before midnight is worth two hours after.
Our new method of doing that is quicker and more efficient.
I think that the language that they\'re speaking is French.
I know a few words of French, just enough to be understood.
Tom used to write articles for one of the local newspapers.
Tom walked through the revolving door into the hotel lobby.
We haven\'t been able to find out where Tom got his degree.
Tom didn\'t realize he wasn\'t going to be able to do that.
I have two sons. One is in Boston and the other in Chicago.
I\'m pretty sure Tom and Mary have never visited Australia.
We won\'t have enough time to do that before Tom gets here.
I offered to pick Tom up, but he wanted to come by himself.
Tom is staying at a motel while his house is being painted.
I knew you wouldn\'t like the kind of songs that Tom sings.
I know Tom is going to the hospital, but I don\'t know why.
She wouldn\'t have married him if she had known him better.
I\'m pretty sure Tom and Mary are having a party next week.
Tom opened his wallet and pulled out his driver\'s license.
Tom ought to have known that Mary wasn\'t going to be here.
Tom found the evidence we needed to convict Mary\'s killer.
Tom finally mustered up the courage to tell Mary the truth.
Tom gave Mary a copy of the speech he was planning to give.
Tom would\'ve shown you how to do that if you\'d asked him.
I don\'t think this is an appropriate time to discuss this.
Tom usually wears sunglasses even when it\'s not so bright.
We should think about this carefully before we do anything.
Tom lost his mother and father when he was three years old.
Tom made sure everybody knew what they were supposed to do.
Tom makes a lot of money translating menus for restaurants.
Tom never expected that Mary would really keep her promise.
Tom didn\'t read the book his teacher had told him to read.
Tom wasn\'t happy with how the painters painted his office.
Tom tried to remember the doctor\'s name, but he couldn\'t.
Several students in the back of the classroom were texting.
Since he was able to walk so far, he must have strong legs.
The police searched Tom\'s room, but didn\'t find anything.
The only thing that my wife knows how to cook is spaghetti.
Tom didn\'t start to play the trombone until he was twenty.
Tom thought that Mary was wasting her time studying French.
Would you and your friends like to play basketball with us?
Would you please allow me to treat you to dinner next week?
Yesterday was the first time I had spoken to Tom in French.
I\'m a stranger here myself. I\'m afraid I can\'t help you.
I don\'t know why Tom didn\'t want to go to Boston with me.
